description:
Attackers may change the file creation time of a backdoor to make it look like it was installed with the operating system.
Note that many processes legitimately change the creation time of a file; it does not necessarily indicate malicious activity.
false_positives: Changes made to or by the local NTP service
name: File Creation Date Changed to Another Year
query: (((PreviousCreationUtcTime:2022* AND (NOT (CreationUtcTime:2022*))) OR (PreviousCreationUtcTime:202* AND (NOT (CreationUtcTime:202*)))) AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Windows\\system32\\ProvTool.exe" OR "C\:\\Windows\\System32\\usocoreworker.exe" OR "C\:\\Windows\\ImmersiveControlPanel\\SystemSettings.exe") OR file.path.text:C\:\\ProgramData\\USOPrivate\\UpdateStore\\* OR file.path.text:(*.tmp OR *.temp)) OR (process.executable.text:C\:\\WINDOWS\\* AND process.executable.text:*\\TiWorker.exe AND file.path.text:*.cab))))
author: frack113
Florian Roth
